page.title: 20SPORT
page.content: {FOOTBALL}is very popular.At the lower school there is a small team of football players coached by an ex- football coach.Football is basically a game played by two teams of eleven players.They play this on a grass pitch.There is a ball which one team kicks one way and the other team kicks it the other way. {BICYCLE RACING }is held on Tuesdays on the edge of Southill.The racing is held over {10 mile }and {25 mile } courses.A bicycle is a two wheeled machine that someone sits on.When they pedel, the bike moves along forwards. When they are geared correctly they reach fast speeds. {TENNIS }is played by two people.It is played over a net.They hit the ball towards each other and score when the ball is played out or hit into the net.
